title: Coronavirus Resource Center and Updates
cleaned_text: and Updates We are diligently monitoring the development of COVID-19 and taking all necessary precautions for the safety and well-being of our community. We are working closely with local and state officials and remain vigilant, following the [Centers for Disease Control (CDC)](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/healthcare-facilities/index.html) and [Florida Department of Health guidelines.](http://www.floridahealth.gov/diseases-and-conditions/COVID-19/providers/index.html) Parents should contact their child's physician office for additional information regarding surgeries and procedures. COVID-19 Vaccination Learn about eligibility for the vaccine, appointments and FAQs. [Vaccine Update](/patients-families/coronavirus-disease/covid-19-vaccination) Safety, Appointments & Visitor Information We can safely provide the care your child needs in all of our locations.
